item.title: How to stop players from getting pkp's from a recently killed player
item.dc:creator: @k2_k0 k2 k0
item.description:
@k2_k0 wrote:

How would I go about this? I already have a check for the same ip not giving any pkp’s, But I still need to stop players from getting pkp’s from a player they have just killed.

Heres the code:

public void increaseKillCount(Player killed) { killed.deathCount++; PkRank.checkRank(killed); if (killed.getSession().getIP().equals(getSession().getIP())) return; getInventory().addItem(12852, 4); killCount++; getPackets().sendGameMessage("<col=ff0000>You have killed " + killed.getDisplayName() + ", you have now " + killCount + " kills."); PkRank.checkRank(this); }

Sorry just realised I posted this in the wrong section, Mod please move to server help section, Please and thank you!

Read full topic
item.source: How to stop players from getting pkp's from a recently killed player
